sentences.english: Mr. Boesche is still on the faculty.
sentences.chinese: 波希現在仍是西方學院教員。

sentences.english: P. S. This is a male permitted teacher by EDB.
sentences.chinese: 此男導師爲教育局準用教員。

sentences.english: A Closing Ceremony will be held by Mandarin Class for all students and tutors.
sentences.chinese: 華文班將會在舉辦閉幕典禮給所有學員及教員。

sentences.english: A teacher must show his authority.
sentences.chinese: 教員必須表現得有威信。

sentences.english: A Chinese teacher there helped me very much.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的一個國文教員對我幫助很大。

sentences.english: Did the teacher from the United Kingdom eat a Chinese steamed bun of 30 in a morning, yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 昨天早上誰人從英國來的教員吃了30個包子嗎？

sentences.english: She is also an honorary faculty member at Fuyuan Cultural Arts Center in China.
sentences.chinese: 她同時也是中國富源文化藝術中心的名譽教員。

sentences.english: He experienced the shift from a "teacher" to a "writer".
sentences.chinese: 老舍經歷了由“教員”向“寫家”的逐步轉換歷程。

sentences.english: Assist chief instructor to flight teaching management .
sentences.chinese: 協助主任教員進行教學管理工作。

sentences.english: The instructor distributed the test papers to the students.
sentences.chinese: 教員把試卷分發給學生。

sentences.english: Yusra Hussain is a clinical instructor a geriatrician.
sentences.chinese: 侯賽因醫生是一名臨牀帶教教員和老年醫學專家。

sentences.english: I am not the teaching staff or alumni of Po Leung Kuk Laws Foundation College.
sentences.chinese: 本人並非保良局陸慶濤小學之在職教員或校友。

sentences.english: The teacher allowed us an hour for written work.
sentences.chinese: 教員給我們一小時做筆頭作業。

sentences.english: The whole faculty finally passes a decision to cancel the model test.
sentences.chinese: 全體教員最終通過一項決議，取消模擬考試。

sentences.english: A really excellent teacher needs to spend time learning.
sentences.chinese: 一個實正優良的教員須要花時間進修。

definition: to establish/to found/to create (a good environment)
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
